title: Ticket #1038: Single quotes don't work with CondorUtils::runcmd()
description:
When passing a command to runcmd like this:

runcmd("thingy | sed -e 's/[ \\t]//g'")

runcmd fails because it takes the above string and wraps it like this: \'$args\' before giving it to sh -c to run. This, of course, screws up a lot of stuff.
